title: Implement config/settings.py
description:
Implement Pydantic Settings with env vars.

## Pattern
```python
from pydantic_settings import BaseSettings

class Settings(BaseSettings):
    ai_provider: str = "gemini"
    gemini_model: str = "gemini-2.5-pro"
    openai_model: str = "gpt-4-turbo"
    google_cloud_project: str
    bq_dataset: str
    meta_app_id: str
    meta_app_secret: str
    environment: str = "development"
    log_level: str = "INFO"

    class Config:
        env_file = ".env"

settings = Settings()
```
